title: Graphical Analysis of function: Geometry part - d

content.description: Let f be a function defined on the closed interval -3 ≤ x ≤ 4 with f(0) = 3. The graph of f', the derivative of f, consists of one line segment and a semicircle, as shown above.
content.question: Find f(-3) and f(4). Show the work that leads to your answers.

frqParts.text: Find f(-3) and f(4). Show the work that leads to your answers.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
